(Simplified: 觯)
Chinese Definition:
①古代酒器，青銅製，形似尊而小，或有蓋。盛行於中國商代晚期和西周初期。

觶字的基本解释

觶
zhì
见“觯”。

觶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhì］
［《廣韻》支義切，去寘，章。］
［《廣韻》章移切，平支，章。］
“觯1”的繁体字。
古代饮酒器。圆腹，侈口，圈足，或有盖，形似尊而小。青铜制，盛行于殷代和西周初期。陶制者多为明器。

觶字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【角字部】　觶； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1145第03
〔古文〕?【唐韻】之義切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】支義切，?音寘。【說文】鄕飮酒角也。禮曰：一人洗舉觶，受四升。【玉篇】酒觴也。【增韻】實曰觴，虛曰觶。【禮·禮器】尊者舉觶。【註】三升曰觶，觶，適也。飮當自適也。　又【正韻】罰爵也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】章移切【正韻】支而切，?寘平聲。義同。　【說文】或作?觗。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhì］
["Guangyun" Zhiyi cut, go to set, chapter. ]
["Guangyun" chapter shift cut, flat branch, chapter. ]
Traditional characters for "觯1".
Ancient drinking fountain. Round belly, extravagant mouth, ringed feet, or covered, resembling a respectable but small shape. Bronze system prevailed in the Yin Dynasty and the early Western Zhou Dynasty. The pottery is mostly Ming ware.
goblet
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Jiao Zi Department] 　觯; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1145 No. 03
[Ancient text]? [Tang Yun] meaning cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Zhiyi cut,? Phonetic setting. [Said the text] The 鄕飮酒角 also. Li said: One person washes the bob and receives four liters. [Jade articles] Wine goblin is also. [Enhance rhyme] Actually, it is called 觞, and imaginary is called 觯. [Ritual·Ritual Vessel] The Venerable Raises a bow. [Note] Sansheng said "Bo," "Suitable". It's also self-contained.　[Zheng Yun] Punish the jue.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Chapter Moves and Cuts [Zheng Yun] Branches and cuts,? Set the sound. The same meaning.　【Speaking text】or writing? 觗.
